data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Otani Pixel Fantasy Enemy Pack Vol.2
data.detailed_description:
Looking for an intimidating monster to make an epic battle? Look no further than Otani’s high-quality fantasy pixel art series!

This is a nice to have pack for creators looking to make an epic-looking world or story!
This Enemy Pack includes 30 different types of pixel art of fantasy enemies, from common to legendary monsters. These would definitely make your world more vivid than ever!

Included materials
＜Graphics＞
This package contains 30 types of pixel art data - 3 small, 4 medium, and 3 large type monsters, including iconic ones like Cyclops, Centaurs, Kraken, etc. Each monster type contains
3 types of color and detail variations, totaling up to 30 sets of pixel art. Each set also has two sizes to suit all your battle needs!.

＜Reference＞
────────────────────────

────────────────────────

Recommended purchasing this pack in conjunction with other Otani’s packs to maintain a consistent art style and enhance the realism of your game!
